name: Climb Caterpillar!
description:
This game was made for the Cozy Fall Jam 2022. It took about 3 days to make using Unity. Everything made by me unless noted otherwise in the credits below.

Credits

Clouds, end screen, tree texture art: Krishna Mistry

Fonts used:

  • Falling Rain - Main font

Music used:

  • Gymnopedie No. 1 - Main music
    • Composed by Erik Satie
    • Music: Gymnopedie No. 1 by Kevin MacLeod 
    •  Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/3837-gymnopedie-no-1 
    •  License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license 
    •  Artist website: https://incompetech.com

Art assets:

  • Birch Leaf Texture - Falling leaf texture
